entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
